translations: n.（日式烹饪）调味用米酒，味醂；（Mirin）（瑞典）米林（人名）

phrs.translation: 味醂, 味霖, 味淋, 日本甜米酒

sentences.sentence: Dark pulses don't degrade or bleed nearly as much as light pulses do, said Mirin.
sentences.translation: “暗脉冲则不会被降低或者散开，几乎和产生光脉冲一样。”梅林说道。

sentences.sentence: The new dark pulse laser could be used to improve fiber optic communications, said Mirin.
sentences.translation: 梅林说道，新的黑暗脉冲激光可以用于改善光纤通讯。

sentences.sentence: I also used my own concoction of sauce (a combination of light soya sauce, mirin and sugar).
sentences.translation: 我还用上自制的调料(就是把生抽，味醂与糖混在一起。)
